snippet: The Hell Gate Bridge, one of the least known of the bridges in New York City, has an ugly paint job, and a long explanation for having it.
abstract: The Hell Gate Bridge, one of the least known of the bridges in New York City, has an ugly paint job, and a long explanation for having it.

headline.main: A Bad Impression Outlasts a Bridge's New Paint
headline.print_headline: A Railroad Bridge 96 Years Old, 3.5 Miles Long and Many Shades of Lavender
